catalog.name: Existing wind plants
catalog.description: This collection includes information relating to the location and power class of wind turbines generators having power higher than 200 kW installed on the national territory.

members.name: Database of wind turbine generators
members.description:
Map of wind turbine generators present on the national territory (reference year 2019) classified by power class (200-1000 kW, 1000â€“2000 kW, 2000-3000 kW, >3000 kW).
RSE elaboration from several databases (Atlaimpianti, The Wind Power and Sentinel-2 satellite images).
For more details refer to the paper Mapping onshore wind turbine generators in Italy from Sentinel-2 data.
